ext.conf.auxiliaryThemeRegistries.desc: GitHub repositories that are auxiliary theme registries. Should be in format `<owner>/<repo>`. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.
ext.conf.auxiliaryThemeRegistries.err: Enter repositories in the valid format. For example: Codemos-Inc/Auxiliary-Theme-Registry
ext.conf.dark.accentColor.desc: HEX color code defining the accent color for `Codemos Modern (Dark)`. Will be discarded if `codemosModern.dark.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#configuration) for reference.
ext.conf.dark.accentColor.err: Enter a valid HEX color code. For example: #CB8569
ext.conf.dark.adaptiveMode.desc: Adaptive mode to be used in `Codemos Modern (Dark)`. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.dark.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#adaptability) for reference.
ext.conf.dark.auxiliary*Theme.err: Enter a valid auxiliary theme. For example: Codemos-Inc/Auxiliary-Theme-Registry/Microsoft/Defaults/Dark Modern
ext.conf.dark.auxiliaryCodeTheme.desc: Auxiliary theme to be used as the code theme for `Codemos Modern (Dark)`. Should be in format `<owner>/<repo>/<publisher>/<extension>/<theme>`. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.
ext.conf.dark.auxiliaryUiTheme.desc: Auxiliary theme to be used as the UI theme for `Codemos Modern (Dark)`. Should be in format `<owner>/<repo>/<publisher>/<extension>/<theme>`. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.
ext.conf.dark.design.desc: Design to be used in `Codemos Modern (Dark)`. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.dark.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#configuration) for reference.
ext.conf.dark.title: Dark Variant
ext.conf.light.accentColor.desc: HEX color code defining the accent color for `Codemos Modern (Light)`. Will be discarded if `codemosModern.light.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#configuration) for reference.
ext.conf.light.accentColor.err: Enter a valid HEX color code. For example: #784F3F
ext.conf.light.adaptiveMode.desc: Adaptive mode to be used in `Codemos Modern (Light)`. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.light.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#adaptability) for reference.
ext.conf.light.auxiliary*Theme.err: Enter a valid auxiliary theme. For example: Codemos-Inc/Auxiliary-Theme-Registry/Microsoft/Defaults/Light Modern
ext.conf.light.auxiliaryCodeTheme.desc: Auxiliary theme to be used as the code theme for `Codemos Modern (Light)`. Should be in format `<owner>/<repo>/<publisher>/<extension>/<theme>`. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.
ext.conf.light.auxiliaryUiTheme.desc: Auxiliary theme to be used as the UI theme for `Codemos Modern (Light)`. Should be in format `<owner>/<repo>/<publisher>/<extension>/<theme>`. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#modularity) for reference.
ext.conf.light.design.desc: Design to be used in `Codemos Modern (Light)`. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.light.auxiliaryUiTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#configuration) for reference.
ext.conf.light.title: Light Variant
ext.conf.textDecorations.bold.desc: Abstract symbols are displayed with a bold decoration. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.*.auxiliaryCodeTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#color-and-code-intelligibility) for reference.
ext.conf.textDecorations.forComments.des: Decorations to display for comments. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.*.auxiliaryCodeTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#color-and-code-intelligibility) for reference.
ext.conf.textDecorations.italic.desc: Static symbols are displayed with an italic decoration. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.*.auxiliaryCodeTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#color-and-code-intelligibility) for reference.
ext.conf.textDecorations.strikethrough.d: Deprecated symbols are displayed with a strikethrough decoration. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.*.auxiliaryCodeTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#color-and-code-intelligibility) for reference.
ext.conf.textDecorations.title: Text Decorations
ext.conf.textDecorations.underline.desc: Symbols permitting write access are displayed with an underline decoration. Will be discarded when `codemosModern.*.auxiliaryCodeTheme` is set. See [the docs](https://github.com/Codemos-Inc/Codemos-Modern#color-and-code-intelligibility) for reference.
ext.desc: Innovative, modern theme suite/hub for VS Code
